echo --Programming FPGA--
fatload mmc 0:1 0x2000000 novpekcvlite.rbf
fpga load 0 0x2000000 ${filesize}
run bridge_enable_handoff
mw 0x30000000 0x31a17bdd
mw 0x30000004 0xfc178b52
mw 0x30000008 0x58f6d156
mw 0x3000000C 0x59a7026a
mw 0x30000010 0x9ac356af
mw 0x30000014 0x2fa77956
mw 0x30000018 0xeaec95cd
mw 0x3000001C 0x91b8ace2
mw 0x30000020 0x31a17bdd
mw 0x30000024 0xfc178b52
mw 0x30000028 0x58f6d156
mw 0x3000002C 0x59a7026a
mw 0x30000030 0x9ac356af
mw 0x30000034 0x2fa77956
mw 0x30000038 0xeaec95cd
mw 0x3000003C 0x91b8ace2
